content: > this bulky knit textured scarf offers > a relaxing and mediative knit simple > knit and purl stitches combine > effortlessly to create a textured > chevron stitch pattern that is so much > easier to knit than it appears the > stitch pattern is reversible making > this the perfect scarf that will fly > off the needles the pattern derives > its name from a meandering local > river **construction ** barwon scarf is knit from end to end with an interchange of simple knit and purl stitches forming the chevron pattern instructions are both written and charted **sizing ** one size length 66½ inches/167 cms width 7½ inches/19 cms **skill level ** easy **techniques used ** knit and purl working from a chart **yarn requirements ** bendigo woollen mills rustic 12 ply 100% wool 284yd 260m /200g - 1 ball or bulky/12ply weight yarn of approximately 284 yards/260 metres original yarn is a bulky weight worsted spun yarn pattern would work equally well in a lighter aran or worsted weight yarn resulting in a narrower scarf
